alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 26 at 5:22AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in areas below 10000 feet. Higher peaks above 10000 feet can see higher additional amounts of 6 to 9 inches. Southern parts of the range will see less snow, with additional accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Winds will be gusty at times over South Pass, leading to areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
